title: Is a man in Joker the face of paint running for governor in Japan?
subtitle: His political party was said to have aimed at making his region "land of dreams and magic."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In March 2021, a sportsman drawing a face in the form of a comic book by the Joker Superfellin announced that he was running for governor in a Japanese district known as Shiba Province.
